name: Iron Guardian
description: The Iron Guardian is a large, formidable construct, made for combat and known for its high durability and slashing sword attacks.
memorable: It has the ability to absorb fire damage, regaining hit points from such attacks.
goals: Act as a guardian or protector, following the commands of its creator in combat scenarios.
relations: Could be commanded by a wizard or warlock, often found in the service of powerful entities.
environment: Typically found in dungeons or locations where constructs are created and maintained.
strengths: Extremely durable with high hit points and damage absorption from fire, plus strong magic resistance.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma limit its function to following commands; vulnerable to specific non-magical attacks.
attacks: Can perform two powerful slashing attacks with its sword and unleash a cone of poisonous gas on enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Absorption allows it to heal from fire damage instead of taking harm.
additional_information: Immune to polymorph and similar changing effects.
Can redirect missed ranged attacks back at foes.
Requires no air, food, or sleep, making it tireless in its duty.
Possesses a high Strength score, enhancing its melee attacks.
Resistant to many magical effects alongside damage immunity to poison and fire.
